viewData.name: LG LJ4540 22" Class Full HD IPS LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG LJ4540 22" Class Full HD IPS LED TV featuring Full HD 1920 x 1080 IPS LED Panel, HDMI Input Triple XD Engine. Review LG LJ4540
viewData.long_description: Enjoy high-definition content with the LG LJ4540- 22" Class Full HD IPS LED TV. This 21.5" LED-backlit IPS LCD panel features a native resolution of 1920 x 1080, allowing you to view detailed 1080p Full HD images. Its HDMI input will allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles. A remote control is included as an added convenience.
